Class HexNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • HexNumber

  • public class HexNumber
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent the abstract data type of a hexadecimal number
    Version:
    12/4/2018
    Author:
    Fowad Sohail

    • Constructor Detail

      • HexNumber

        public HexNumber(java.lang.String hexValue)
          throws InvalidHexException
        Constructor to make a HexNumber from a valid hexadecimal String
        Parameters:
        hexValue - The String representation of a hexadecimal number
        Throws:
        InvalidHexException - Thrown when hexValue does not have valid hexadecimal characters (0-9, A-F)
